description:
Protection with dexterity for your cold-weather runs. These stretchy gloves have a brushed interior to keep you warm during shoulder season runs, with a deployable cover mitten to add an extra layer of wind- and waterproofness when the weather turns. The grippy palm gives you a solid hold on your bottle or device, and reflective elements add visibility as the days get shorter.

  • Stretchy fabric with a brushed interior that's warm and soft against the skin
  • Wind- and waterproof cover mitten
  • Silicone print on palm and fingers
  • Touchscreen-compatible fingers let you cycle through songs without removing your gloves
name: Nofel Basic Mittens - Unisex
